parameters.name: ExcludeRegionIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of regions to be excluded. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ExcludeResourceGroupIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of resource groups to be excluded. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ExcludeResourceIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of resources to be excluded. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ExcludeResourceTypesScope
parameters.description: The resource types to be excluded. Separate multiple resource types with commas (,).

parameters.name: RegionIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of regions. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ResourceGroupIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of resource groups. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ResourceIdsScope
parameters.description: The IDs of resources. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ResourceTypesScope
parameters.description: The resource types. Separate multiple resource types with commas (,).

parameters.name: RuleContents
parameters.description: The content records of the rule.
